languages.text: {n}Вскоре ваше внимание рассеивается, и хладная торговка без труда одерживает победу.{/n}
{n}The amasec makes it difficult to keep a clear head. You lose focus on the game, and it is not long before the Cold Trader claims victory.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вскоре ваше внимание рассеивается, и хладная торговка без труда одерживает победу.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Eventually, you focus fails you, and the Cold Trader effortlessly claims her victory.{/n}
{n}Eventually, you focus fails you, and the Cold Trader effortlessly claims her victory.{/n}
{n}The amasec makes it difficult to keep a clear head. You lose focus on the game, and it is not long before the Cold Trader claims victory.{/n}

{n}The amasec makes it difficult to keep a clear head. You lose focus on the game, and it is not long before the Cold Trader claims victory.{/n}
{n}The amasec makes it difficult to keep a clear head. You lose focus on the game, and it is not long before the Cold Trader claims victory.{/n}

languages.text: {n}À force de boire de l'amasec, vous avez de plus en plus de mal à garder les idées claires et finissez par perdre votre concentration. Il ne faut pas longtemps à l'adepte du Commerce Froid pour remporter la victoire.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The amasec makes it difficult to keep a clear head. You lose focus on the game, and it is not long before the Cold Trader claims victory.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}À force de boire de l'amasec, vous avez de plus en plus de mal à garder les idées claires et finissez par perdre votre concentration. Il ne faut pas longtemps à l'adepte du Commerce Froid pour remporter la victoire.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El amasec no te pone fácil mantener la mente despejada. Pierdes la concentración y la Comerciante Fría no tarda en hacerse con la victoria.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The amasec makes it difficult to keep a clear head. You lose focus on the game, and it is not long before the Cold Trader claims victory.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El amasec no te pone fácil mantener la mente despejada. Pierdes la concentración y la Comerciante Fría no tarda en hacerse con la victoria.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你喝了太多艾玛赛克酒，头脑变得混混沌沌，根本看不清棋盘上的棋子都是怎么回事。没过多久，婕伊便赢得了胜利。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The amasec makes it difficult to keep a clear head. You lose focus on the game, and it is not long before the Cold Trader claims victory.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你喝了太多艾玛赛克酒，头脑变得混混沌沌，根本看不清棋盘上的棋子都是怎么回事。没过多久，婕伊便赢得了胜利。{/n}

languages.text: {n}アマセックのせいで冷静さを保つのが難しい。ゲームに集中できなくなり、コールド・トレーダーが勝利を主張するまでにそう時間はかからないだろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The amasec makes it difficult to keep a clear head. You lose focus on the game, and it is not long before the Cold Trader claims victory.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}アマセックのせいで冷静さを保つのが難しい。ゲームに集中できなくなり、コールド・トレーダーが勝利を主張するまでにそう時間はかからないだろう。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Amasec macht es schwer, einen klaren Kopf zu behalten. Du konzentrierst dich nicht mehr auf das Spiel, und schon bald erringt die Kalthändlerin den Sieg.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The amasec makes it difficult to keep a clear head. You lose focus on the game, and it is not long before the Cold Trader claims victory.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Amasec macht es schwer, einen klaren Kopf zu behalten. Du konzentrierst dich nicht mehr auf das Spiel, und schon bald erringt die Kalthändlerin den Sieg.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Amasek yüzünden ayık kalmakta zorlanıyorsun. Oyuna odaklanamıyorsun ve Soğuk Tacir çok geçmeden zafere ulaşıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The amasec makes it difficult to keep a clear head. You lose focus on the game, and it is not long before the Cold Trader claims victory.{/n}
